changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE T_SOURCE CHANGE COLUMN LAST_UPDATE LAST_UPDATE timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

changeSet.author: santamik
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO T_CLIENT_OBLIGATION_LNK (FK_CLIENT_ID, FK_RA_ID, STATUS) SELECT FK_CLIENT_ID, FK_OBJECT_ID, STATUS FROM T_CLIENT_LNK WHERE TYPE = 'A'

changeSet.author: santamik
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO T_CLIENT_SOURCE_LNK (FK_CLIENT_ID, FK_SOURCE_ID, STATUS) SELECT FK_CLIENT_ID, FK_OBJECT_ID, STATUS FROM T_CLIENT_LNK WHERE TYPE = 'S'

changeSet.author: santamik
changeSet.comment: Refs #89743 Add data from overlap_url as 'see-also'
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO T_OBLIGATION_RELATION (FK_RA_ID, RELATION, FK_RA_ID2) SELECT PK_RA_ID,'see-also',replace(overlap_url, 'http://rod.eionet.europa.eu/obligations/', '') FROM T_OBLIGATION WHERE OVERLAP_URL like 'http://rod.eionet.europa.eu/obligations/%'

changeSet.author: ivascu
changeSet.comment: Setting the fk_type_id as optional, as the code doesn't set it
